method.name: Install
method.tp:docstring: Install a list of Downloadable Content (DLC).

arg.name: dlc_module_list
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (DlcModuleList, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) of a list of DLC modules to install.

method.name: Purge
method.tp:docstring: Removes a DLC and all files related to it.

method.name: GetInstalled
method.tp:docstring: Returns a list of installed Downloadable Content (DLC) IDs and marks the inactive DLCs as unmountable.

arg.name: dlc_module_list
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (DlcModuleList, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) of a list of installed DLC modules.

method.name: GetState
method.tp:docstring: Returns the state of a DLC.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (DlcState, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) indicating the state of a DLC.

method.name: InstallCompleted
method.tp:docstring: Notifies dlcservice that the installation is complete for the given DLCs.

method.name: UpdateCompleted
method.tp:docstring: Notifies dlcservice that the update is complete for the given DLCs.

arg.name: install_status
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (InstallStatus, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) of install operation status.
